subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Suits and Litigation
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: SCA Promotions, which paid Lance Armstrong millions of dollars in bonuses for winning the Tour de France, is seeking its money back because Armstrong was stripped of his titles.
snippet: SCA Promotions, which paid Lance Armstrong millions of dollars in bonuses for winning the Tour de France, is seeking its money back because Armstrong was stripped of his titles.
